Title: DynaVis: Dynamically Synthesized UI Widgets for Visualization Editing
Notes: Allow user to edit while allow them to see instant visual feedbacks.

Title: A Human Information Processing Theory of the Interpretation of Visualizations: Demonstrating Its Utility
Notes: RIST models human memory structures during visualization use, " RIST adopts a human information processing perspective in order to address the immediate, short timescale, cognitive load likely to be experienced by visualization users."

Title: Make Interaction Situated: Designing User Acceptable Interaction for Situated Visualization in Public Environments
Notes: Situated visualization in public environments with the consideration of users' needs for data and interaction

Title: Card-Based Approach to Engage Exploring Ethics in AI for Data Visualization
Notes: Using cards to help users learn, discuss, and reflect on the ethical dilemmas that may arise from the integration of AI technology and visualization

Title: DeepSee: Multidimensional Visualizations of Seabed Ecosystems
Notes: Developed a interactive data workspaces that visualizes 2D and 3D interpolations of biogeochemical and microbial processes in deep ocean sediment samples,

Title: Discovering Accessible Data Visualizations for People with ADHD
Notes: A survey compared the comprehension of data visualizations between participants with and without ADHD that leading to design recommendations for accessible visualizations for people with ADHD.

Title: Do You See What I See? A Qualitative Study Eliciting High-Level Visualization Comprehension
Notes: A qualitative study on three types of visualizations reveals that people’s comprehension of high-level patterns often misaligns with designers' goals and traditional perceptual studies, highlighting the need for multiple perspectives to evaluate visualization effectiveness.

Title: DoodleTunes: Interactive Visual Analysis of Music-Inspired Children Doodles with Automated Feature Annotation
Notes: An interactive visualization system DoodleTunes using deep learning for annotating data features, facilitates the exploration of correlations between children's music-inspired doodles and corresponding music pieces,

Title: Glanceable Data Visualizations for Older Adults: Establishing Thresholds and Examining Disparities Between Age Groups
Notes: A study about how visualization type and number of data points affect glanceable perception. (smartwatch visualizations for adults aged 65 and older)

Title: MAIDR: Making Statistical Visualizations Accessible with Multimodal Data Representation
Notes: The MAIDR system enhances data exploration for blind users

Title: How Do Low-Vision Individuals Experience Information Visualization?
Notes: how low-vision individuals interact with visualizations and suggests personalized tools based on qualitative insights.

Title: IntentTuner: An Interactive Framework for Integrating Human Intentions in Fine-tuning Text-to-Image Generative Models
Notes: enhancing fine-tuning processes for text-to-image generative models by integrating user intentions throughout

Title: Table Illustrator: Puzzle-based interactive authoring of plain tables
Notes: developing a tool (Table Illustrator) for creating and customizing tables efficiently

Title: Is It AI or Is It Me? Understanding Users’ Prompt Journey with Text-to-Image Generative AI Tools
Notes: the human-centered design aspects of text-to-image AI tools, emphasizing how users craft prompts and interact with AI outputs

Title: PromptCharm: Text-to-Image Generation through Multi-modal Prompting and Refinement
Notes: PromptCharm, a system designed to enhance text-to-image creation by supporting prompt refinement, style exploration, and visual feedback through model attention visualizations.

Title: An Accessible, Three-Axis Plotter for Enhancing Calligraphy Learning through Generated Motion
Notes: a plotter-based system designed to facilitate the learning of calligraphy by guiding novice learners in replicating expert movements.
